column4: i read the man pages, but i still can't figure out: how do i unmount all drives?
how do i unmount all drives i previously mounted?
i already tried umount -a...the srives are still mounted
which partition you want to umount
/dev/sda3, sda2, sda5 mounted to /ubuntu, /ubuntu2, /ubuntu5 respectively (i think)
how can i tell which drives are mounted to which directory?
stroyan: now check this out: ubuntu@ubuntu:/$ sudo mount -t reiserfs /dev/sda6 /ubuntu6
how do i mount sda6 to /ubuntu6?
there are no traces of /ubuntu6 in my mtab file
without -t options, the prompt says that sda looks like swap space lolol
